Detailed Description

An input output class that deals a student object.

Deals with all the input and output between main and the student class. This class deals solely with input and ouput of a students details. The filenames are entererd into the constructor as strings.

Author:
Jake Kroon
Version:
01
Date:
22/04/2015
Bug:
No bugs to my knowledge

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

StudentIO::StudentIO ( string  iFileName,
string  oFileName 
)

Constructor that sets the input and output file names.

This constructor initialises the StudentIO object to have the names of the input and output files, iFileName and oFileName respectively set as strings.

Parameters:
iFileName - The name of the input file as a string
oFileName - The name of the output file as a string
Returns:
void

Outputs the highest, lowest and average GPA and details.
